engine.component

Class CollisionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.component.Component
      • engine.component.CollisionComponent

  • public class CollisionComponent
extends Component
    Specifies a component that collides
    Author:
    Marco

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionComponent(Entity entity, org.jsfml.system.Vector2f[] pts, CollisionID id, CollisionID... collidingids)
      Creates a collision component with a convex poly hitbox, having a specific id and colliding with other collision components.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionComponent

        public CollisionComponent(Entity entity,
                          org.jsfml.system.Vector2f[] pts,
                          CollisionID id,
                          CollisionID... collidingids)
        Creates a collision component with a convex poly hitbox, having a specific id and colliding with other collision components.
        Parameters:
        entity - The active entity
        pts - Points in the hitbox
        id - The ID associated with this collision component
        collidingids - The ID's this component can collide with

    • Method Detail

        Tests for a collision
        Parameters:
        other - The component to be collided with
        Returns:
        Whether they collide
